ai-tika-s0402t33:1_0: Hence observed: “Repulsiveness of the truth, he is the truth of peace” . Then on the contrary, it is the time for contemplation of the aggregates.
ai-tika-s0402t33:2_0: Thus there is the plantains on the Uttarakuru
ai-tika-s0402t33:3_0: The place where the cowherd has been constructed is finished.
ai-tika-s0402t33:4_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-tika-s0402t33:5_0: if it is the upper limb.
